name: 杰森·奥雷姆兰
name_full: 杰森·奥雷姆兰 Jason Oremland
introduction: Jason Oremland grew up in McLean, Virginia. He has worked as an American writer and producer for film and television. In addition, he has worked as an Production coordinator/assistant for Warner Bros. animation, Candid Camera Incorporated, ZM Productions, and DIC Entertainment. Jason has co-authored the graphic novel "The Return of King Doug" for Oni Press with Greg Erb. And Jason worked as a production runner for the film "Public Enemies". He has three children and lives in Los Angeles, California.
